title: A group of 5 painters takes 21 hours to paint a house. How long would it take a group of 7 painters to paint the same house? - Quora

response.answer_text: The elementary school answer is that the painting job takes 105 painter-hours, so a group of 7 painters would take 15 hours. The reality is that actual work doesn’t scale this way. Jobs like writing a poem don’t scale at all — 1 is the only realistic number of authors. Some work can’t be done by one person and needs a team, like construction where multiple people need to lift structural members. For house painting, only a painter would know how the job scales, and would know the optimum crew size for a given job and set of constraints.

A group of 5 painters take 21 hours to paint a house. It is equivalent to saying that each of the 5 painters worked for 21 hours each to complete the job. So the complete job is a 5 x 21 hours = 105 hour job. Now if the same job is to be comoleted by 7 painters we can just divide 105 hours by 7 which gives us 15 hours. So 7 painters will take 15 hours to paint the same house. However if this is a trick question, the group of 7 painters will need 0 hours to paint the same house as it has already been painted earlier by those 5 painters.🤪🤪🤪

Method A So 7 is 1,2 times bigger, that means it would be 1,2 faster. 21÷1,2=17,5 Method B 5 is 5/7 times smaller, so the new number will be also smaller by this number(because the more workers, the less time) 21×5/7 Method C 5 do in 21 1 does in 5× more time, so in 105 7 does in 7× less so in 105÷7

You probably want 15 but that’s because your math teacher doesn’t know any real painters. I do. IRL those 2 new guys are getting sent out for weed and beer since the other 5 can do the work so I’m going to say, realistically, about 35.
5 painter completed the job in 21 hours therefore 1 painter will complete the job in (21 x 5) hrs With 7 painters, the job will be completed in : (21 x 5) / 7 = 15 hours
Unless I’m missing something here this seems to be a very simple question. Total painter hours to paint the house = 5 x 21 = 105 hours. Time for seven painters to paint the house = 105 / 7 = 15 hours
